system.effect: A Navigator can use this device by making +0 Awareness Test. If successful, can identify nearby vessels and where they might be out to about one hour's travel, +1 per DoS. Cannot be damaged or destroy except via a critical hit. One per Vessel.

description.value: A Navigator can use this device by making +0 Awareness Test. If successful, can identify nearby vessels and where they might be out to about one hour's travel, +1 per DoS. Cannot be damaged or destroy except via a critical hit. One per Vessel.
